resources.string: Proverbs
"Horns do not grow before the head"
"If a giver is not careful, a beggar will build a house before him"
"Endless war shames even a hero"
"I pointed to you the stars and all you saw was the tip of my finger"
"The body becomes what the food is, the spirit becomes what the thought is"
"I am not dead says father; but keeps planting bark-cloth trees"
"The desire to cheat and the refusal to be cheated are the cause of noise in the market"
"If you know the beginning well, the ending will not trouble you"
"If you go through the high grass that the elephant has already gone through, you will not get soaked with dew"
"It is not changing into a lion that is hard, it is getting the tail of the lion that is"
"He who learns teaches"
"If everyone helps to hold up the sky, then one person does not become tired"
"To get lost is to learn the way"
"Do not threaten to push the swimmer into the river"
"He who admits his fault will not be kept kneeling for long"
"No matter how fortunate a man is, he cannot bear a son before his father"
"If you pray for the rain, be ready for the mud too"
"Facts do not cease to exist just because they are ignored
"He who is truly free is not haunted by himself"
